attributes.action: Halt the closure of the Children's Ward at Ealing Hospital
attributes.additional_details:
Ben Gummer MP: "We are advised that the current proposal is for in-patient paediatric services to continue to be provided at Ealing Hospital until 30 June 2016."

The answer was submitted on 23 Jul 2015 at 11:21.
attributes.background: Virendra Sharma MP received formal confirmation that inpatient services would be ended for children at Ealing Hospital within a year. The Health Minister, having been asked what plans his department had for the local Children’s unit, answered that current services would end on the 30th June 2016.
